question: Can you explain the main responsibilities of a web designer compared to a web developer?
How do you ensure your web designs align with a client’s brand identity?
What’s your process for gathering requirements before starting a new design project?
How do you collaborate with developers to bring your designs to life?
Can you explain the role of typography in web design and why it’s important?
How do you prioritize user experience (UX) while creating visually appealing designs?
What role does accessibility (a11y) play in your design decisions?
How do you approach designing for different screen sizes and devices?
What’s the difference between UI and UX design in the context of web design?
How do you handle feedback or criticism on your designs from clients or team members?
